import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../FormsEstilos/AgregarConsecutivos.css"; import { agregarConsecuApi } from "../../../Api/Seguridad/cosnecutivos"; export default function AgregarConsecutivos() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ tipo: "", descripcion: "", valor: "", prefijo: "" }); const changeForm = e => { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const result = agregarConsecuApi(inputs); } return ( <>
